member.name: T:Neotys.CommonAPI.Client.NeotysAPIClientOlingo
member.summary:
Contains common utilities to connect to a Neotys OData API Server using Apache Olingo implementation.
@author srichert

member.name: F:Neotys.CommonAPI.Client.NeotysAPIClientOlingo.ArgClientEnabled
member.summary: Use -Dnl.client.enabled=false to disable the interaction with the Rest API server.

member.summary: Extract the file name from the content disposition header: EX: Content-Disposition : form-data; name="file"; filename="test_example.txt"

member.summary:
Binary data that contains file name and binary.
@author anouvel
